T02D1291:148a-1: bha ga b'an he badzra s'a dha nam aa bhi
T02D1291:148a-2: sa ma ya kra m'artha pra sa na n'a ma
T02D1291:148a-4: bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs mngon
T02D1291:148a-5: par rtogs pa'i rim pa don rab tu gsal ba
T02D1291:148a-6: zhes bya ba / bcom ldan 'das dpal kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1291:148a-7: gang gi ye shes me lta bus //
T02D1291:148a-8: rnam rtog ma lus sreg mdzad cing //
T02D1291:148a-9: snying rje chu yis sdud mdzad pa //
T02D1291:148a-10: kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te //
T02D1291:148a-11: bdag pas blo dman rnams don du //
T02D1291:148a-12: sgrub thabs don rab gsal ba brtsam //
T02D1291:148a-13: de la rnal 'byor pas dang po dur khrod la
T02D1291:148a-14: sogs pa'i gnas yid du 'ong bar stan bde ba
T02D1291:148a-15: la 'dug ste / bdag nyid kye'i rdo rjer gsal ba'i snying gar pam las padma /
T02D1291:148a-16: de'i steng du ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1291:148a-17: de'i steng du h'um sngon po bsams la /
T02D1291:148a-18: de las 'od 'phros pas sna bug g-yas nas byung
T02D1291:148b-0: bas kye'i rdo rje 'khor dang @148b bcas pa spyan
T02D1291:148b-1: drangs te / mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la /
T02D1291:148b-2: phyi'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod nas goo r'i byang chub kyi sems kyi snod can dang /
T02D1291:148b-3: chom rkun ma rang byung gi me tog gi snod can dang /
T02D1291:148b-4: ro langs ma dri chu'i snod can dang /
T02D1291:148b-5: za phod ma dri chen gyi snod can dang /
T02D1291:148b-6: pukka s'i sha sna tshogs kyi snod can dang /
T02D1291:148b-7: ri khrod ma chang gi snod can dang /
T02D1291:148b-8: gtum mo cang te'u brdung ba dang /
T02D1291:148b-9: g-yung mo 'khyud pa dang ldan pas mchod par bya'o //
T02D1291:148b-10: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D1291:148b-11: 'khor ba thog ma med dus nas //
T02D1291:148b-12: log pa'i rnam par rtog pa yis //
T02D1291:148b-13: lus ngag yid kyis bgyis pa gang //
T02D1291:148b-14: so sor bshags bgyid slan chad sdom //
T02D1291:148b-15: 'gro ba gang gis thar pa'i phyir //
T02D1291:148b-16: bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags pa //
T02D1291:148b-17: de la yang dag yi rang zhing //
T02D1291:148b-18: de dag byang chub mchog tu bsngo //
T02D1291:148b-19: thams cad rang bzhin kye'i rdor dang //
T02D1291:148b-20: de yis bstan pa'i lam mchog dang //
T02D1291:148b-22: bdag ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi //
T02D1291:148b-23: skyon rnams ma lus sel byed cing //
T02D1291:148b-24: yon tan thams cad rgyas byed pa //
T02D1291:148b-25: yid bzhin nor la sogs mtshungs pa //
T02D1291:148b-26: byang chub sems mchog bskyed par bgyi //
T02D1291:148b-27: deng nas kun mkhyen ma thob par //
T02D1291:148b-28: bdag gi lus ni bder gshegs dang //
T02D1291:148b-29: de sras rnams la dbul bar bgyi //
T02D1291:148b-30: dam pa'i lam la gnas par bgyi //
T02D1291:148b-35: de'i 'og tu stong pa nyid bsgoms la /
T02D1291:148b-36: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1291:148b-37: de ltar stong par bsgoms pa las pam las sna
T02D1291:148b-38: tshogs padma de'i steng du ram las nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D1291:148b-39: 'khor / de'i steng du h'um las sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02D1291:148b-41: de las 'od 'phros pa las rdo rje'i ra ba
T02D1291:148b-42: dang bla rer gyur pa la aom raksha raksha h'um
T02D1291:148b-44: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1291:148b-45: de'i nang du chos kyi 'byung gnas dkar po gyen khar gnas par bsam /
T02D1291:148b-46: de'i nang du yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon
T02D1291:148b-47: po gzhu'i dbyibs la ba dan gyis mtshan pa de'i
T02D1291:148b-48: steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru
T02D1291:148b-49: gsum pa rdo rjes mtshan pa /
T02D1291:148b-50: de'i steng du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po bum pas mtshan pa /
T02D1291:149a-0: de'i steng du lam las sa yi @149a * //
T02D1291:149a-1: dkyil 'khor ser po gru bzhi rdo rjes mtshan pa /
T02D1291:149a-2: de'i steng du bh'um las 'khor lo /
T02D1291:149a-3: de'i bdag nyid srid pa bar ma'i bag chags bsam par bya'o //
T02D1291:149a-4: de rnams 'od du zhu ba las gzhal yas khang ngos bzhi dang /
T02D1291:149a-5: sgo bzhi dang rta babs bzhis brgyan pa /
T02D1291:149a-6: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas brgyan pa /
T02D1291:149a-7: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa'o //
T02D1291:149a-8: de'i dkyil du pam las padma 'dab brgyad dmar po /
T02D1291:149a-9: de'i steng du ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i
T02D1291:149a-10: steng du bdud bzhi'i gzugs bsnol ba bsgom par bya'o
T02D1291:149a-14: drag po bzhi dgod par bya'o //
T02D1291:149a-15: mtshams bzhir gshin rje dang nor sbyin dang bden bral dang thags bzangs ris rnams bkod la /
T02D1291:149a-17: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa la ya badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
T02D1291:149a-18: de nas bdud bzhi'i snying gar aa a'a ai a'i
T02D1291:149a-19: au a'u ri r'i li l'i ae aee ao aoo
T02D1291:149a-20: aam aa: rnams las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te me
T02D1291:149a-21: long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02D1291:149a-22: de'i steng du ka kha ga gha nga /
T02D1291:149a-28: sha sha sa ha ksha: dang dha ya ra rnams las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1291:149a-29: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D1291:149a-30: zla ba dang nyi ma'i bar du h'um dang /
T02D1291:149a-31: aa las rdo rje gri gug ste /
T02D1291:149a-32: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1291:149a-33: de dag chu dang 'o ma lta bur 'dres pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so //
T02D1291:149a-34: de las aom dang h'um ngo //
T02D1291:149a-35: de gnyis rdo rje dang gri gug go //
T02D1291:149a-36: de las bzhengs pa'i bcom ldan 'das zhal brgyad phyag bcu drug pa /
T02D1291:149a-38: dbu la thod pa'i phreng bas bskor ba /
T02D1291:149a-39: bdag med mas mgul nas 'khyud pa /
T02D1291:149a-40: phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa sku mdog dkar po
T02D1291:149a-41: g-yas sngo ba g-yon dmar ba ltag pa'i zhal gnag
T02D1291:149a-42: pa'o // phyag g-yas kyi thod pa brgyad na rim
T02D1291:149a-43: par glang po che dang rta dang bong bu dang
T02D1291:149a-44: glang dang rnga mo dang mi dang seng ge dang
T02D1291:149a-46: phyag g-yon gyi thod pa brgyad na sa'i lha dang chu'i lha dang me'i lha dang /
T02D1291:149a-47: rlung gi lha dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang gshin rje dang nor sbyin rnams 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1291:149a-48: lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa kha dog gnag
T02D1291:149a-49: pa skra ser po gyen du ba greng [?] ba
T02D1291:149a-50: phyag g-yas na gri gug g-yon na thod pa 'dzin
T02D1291:149b-0: pa ste / de ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i @149b ye shes so //
T02D1291:149b-1: de nas lha mo'i gnas gsum du byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1291:149b-4: gsang ba'i gnas su a'a: padma byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni /
T02D1291:149b-5: aom padma su kha dha ra ma h'a r'a ga
T02D1291:149b-6: su kham da ta tsa tur a'a nandha bha ga
T02D1291:149b-7: bi sva h'um h'um h'um kar+yam gu ru shva me
T02D1291:149b-8: / rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni /
T02D1291:149b-9: aom badzra ma h'a dve sha tsa tur a'a nanda
T02D1291:149b-10: da ya ka kha ga mu khe ka r'a sho
T02D1291:149b-11: n'a tha h'um h'um h'um kar+yam ku ru shva me
T02D1291:149b-12: / de nas yab yum chags pa chen po'i rol pa las de'i sgras bskul bas /
T02D1291:149b-13: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge
T02D1291:149b-14: lnga po bhr'um aom dzr'im kham h'um rnams byang chub
T02D1291:149b-15: kyi sems kyi rnam par yab kyi zhal nas rdo
T02D1291:149b-17: thig le brgyad du gyur nas padma 'phro ba'i dus su sngags 'di brjod par bya ste /
T02D1291:149b-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
T02D1291:149b-19: thig le brgyad las gam tsam bam gham pam sham
T02D1291:149b-20: lam dam sa bon de dag las phyag g-yas kyi
T02D1291:149b-22: de dag las lha mo brgyad du gyur te /
T02D1291:149b-23: goo r'i nag mo g-yas na gri gug g-yon na nya bsnams pa /
T02D1291:149b-24: shar phyogs su tshangs pa'i steng du gdon par bya ste /
T02D1291:149b-25: de bzhin du lho phyogs su chom rkun ma btsod
T02D1291:149b-26: kyi kha dog can phyag g-yas na cang te'u g-yon
T02D1291:149b-27: na phag pa can dbang po'i steng du'o //
T02D1291:149b-28: ro langs ma dmar ser gser bsregs pa'i mdog can
T02D1291:149b-29: phyag g-yas na rus sbal g-yon na thod pa bsnams
T02D1291:149b-30: pa / nub phyogs su nye dbang gi steng du'o //
T02D1291:149b-31: za phod ma kha dog ljang gu phyag g-yas na sbrul g-yon na thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D1291:149b-32: byang phyogs su drag po'i steng du'o //
T02D1291:149b-33: pukka s'i kha dog sngon mo phyag g-yas na seng ge g-yon na dgra sta bsnams pa /
T02D1291:149b-34: byang shar gyi mtshams na gshin rje'i steng du'o //
T02D1291:149b-35: ri khrod ma sku mdog dkar mo phyag g-yas na dge slong g-yon na gsil byed bsnams pa /
T02D1291:149b-36: shar lho'i mtshams su nor sbyin gyis steng du'o //
T02D1291:149b-37: gtum mo nam mkha'i kha dog can phyag g-yas na 'khor lo /
T02D1291:149b-38: g-yon na thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D1291:149b-39: lho nub kyi mtshams su bden bral gyi steng du'o //
T02D1291:149b-40: g-yung mo sna tshogs pa'i mdog can phyag g-yas na
T02D1291:149b-41: rdo rje g-yon na sdigs mdzub dang ldan pa nub
T02D1291:149b-42: byang mtshams su thags bzangs ris kyi steng du gdon
T02D1291:149b-43: par bya'o // lha mo de dag skyil krung phyed pa gar gyis gnas pa /
T02D1291:149b-44: spyan gsum pa phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa'o //
T02D1291:150a-1: yab yum gyi rol pa'i sgras bskul bas srid pa
T02D1291:150a-2: bar ma'i bag chags kyis yi ge lnga po ho
T02D1291:150a-3: // aom a'a: h'um ho: rnams zhal nas zhugs te /
T02D1291:150a-4: padmar phyin pa tsam gyis yab yum gnyis 'od kyi gong bur gyur pa la /
T02D1291:150a-5: mtshams kyi lha mo rnams kyis glus skul bar byed de /
T02D1291:150a-6: snying rje'i thugs kyis rje btsun bzhengs //
T02D1291:150a-7: pukka s'i ni bdag skyabs mdzod //
T02D1291:150a-8: stong pa'i rang bzhin spangs nas ni //
T02D1291:150a-9: bdag la bde chen rnal 'byor sbyor //
T02D1291:150a-10: khyod dang bral na bdag 'gum pas //
T02D1291:150a-11: kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig / stong ba'i rang bzhin spongs mdzod la //
T02D1291:150a-12: ri khrod ma ni bdag don sgrub //
T02D1291:150a-14: stong pa nyid la ci phyir bzhugs //
T02D1291:150a-15: gtum mo bdag ni zhu ba bgyid //
T02D1291:150a-16: khyod ma langs na phyogs mi 'tshal //
T02D1291:150a-17: bdag gis nyid kyi thugs 'tshal gyi //
T02D1291:150a-18: dbang po'i dran ldan khyod bzhengs shig / g-yung mo bdag ni dran nyams pas //
T02D1291:150a-19: thugs rjes rgyun chad ma mdzad cig / de ltar
T02D1291:150a-20: bskul bas sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran nas
T02D1291:150a-21: / khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs pa ni gong du smos pa lta bu la /
T02D1291:150a-22: sku mdog gnag pa g-yas dkar ba g-yon dmar ba //
T02D1291:150a-23: zhabs phyed krung du bzhugs pa /
T02D1291:150a-24: mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal can /
T02D1291:150a-25: sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1291:150a-26: de nas snying gar pam las padma /
T02D1291:150a-27: de'i steng du ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1291:150a-28: de'i steng du h'um las rdo rje /
T02D1291:150a-29: de las rang dang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa'/
T02D1291:150a-30: de'i thugs kar yang padma dang nyi ma dang h'um las rdo rje /
T02D1291:150a-31: de'i lte ba la h'um bsam par bya'o //
T02D1291:150a-32: de nas aom badzra goo r'i a'a karsha ya dza:
T02D1291:150a-33: zhes brjod pas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mdun gyi
T02D1291:150a-34: nam mkha' la spyan drangs te /
T02D1291:150a-35: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod la /
T02D1291:150a-36: aom badzra tsoo r'i pra be sha ya h'um /
T02D1291:150a-37: zhes brjod pas gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1291:150a-38: aom badzra be t'a l'i spho ta ya bam zhes brjod pas bcing bar bya'o //
T02D1291:150a-39: aom badzra ghasma r'i wa sham ku ru ho: zhes brjod pas dgyes pa bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1291:150a-40: de ltar ye shes kyis bstims pa la skye mched byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1291:150a-41: gti mug rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1291:150a-43: phrag dog rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1291:150a-44: bdag med rnal 'byor ma rnams mig dang rna ba
T02D1291:150a-45: dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid la ming
T02D1291:150a-46: gi yi ge dang po mam dam mam ram sam
T02D1291:150b-0: nam rnams @150b las bskyed par bya ste /
T02D1291:150b-1: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sna tshogs mdog can phyag g-yas
T02D1291:150b-2: na gri gug g-yon na thod pa ro'i gdan can
T02D1291:150b-3: no // aom a'a: h'um gsum las mkha' spyod ma
T02D1291:150b-4: dang sa spyod ma dang sa 'og ma gsum dkar
T02D1291:150b-5: ba dang dmar ba dang gnag pa'o //
T02D1291:150b-6: lha mo sku yi rigs las byung //
T02D1291:150b-7: rnal 'byor ma ni mkha' spyod ma //
T02D1291:150b-8: de dag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02D1291:150b-9: byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol //
T02D1291:150b-10: aom sarba ta th'a ga ra p'u dza ri badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1291:150b-11: lha mo thugs kyi rigs las byung //
T02D1291:150b-13: deng bdag byin brlab gnas su gsol //
T02D1291:150b-14: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta batt'a l'i badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham //
T02D1291:150b-15: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od
T02D1291:150b-16: zer lcags kyu lta bus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams
T02D1291:150b-18: phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi mchod pas mchod la dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02D1291:150b-19: bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa rnams //
T02D1291:150b-20: mgon pos bdag la dbang bskur cig / de nas
T02D1291:150b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag he ru ka'i gzugs
T02D1291:150b-22: su bya ste bdud rtsi lngas bkang ba'i bum pas
T02D1291:150b-23: dbang bskur bas / tsoo r'i dang goo r'i dang /
T02D1291:150b-24: pukka s'i rnams kyi dbu rgyan la mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1291:150b-25: chom rkun ma dang ri khrod ma la rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1291:150b-26: ro langs ma dang gtum mo ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1291:150b-27: za phod ma dang g-yung mo la snang ba mtha' yas bsam par bya'o //
T02D1291:150b-28: aom sarba ta t'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1291:150b-29: de nas yam las rlung dang ram las me'i steng du aa las thod pa'o //
T02D1291:150b-30: de'i nang du zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil du h'um las rdo rje /
T02D1291:150b-31: de'i lte ba la h'um zla ba'i bar du bhr'um
T02D1291:150b-32: a'am dzr'am kham h'um rnams las sangs rgyas lnga bskyed
T02D1291:150b-33: / go ku da ha na rnams las sems can lnga bskyed de /
T02D1291:150b-34: me sbar ba de dag 'od du zhu ba la
T02D1291:150b-35: rdo rje'i lte ba'i h'um las 'od 'phros pas phyogs
T02D1291:150b-36: bcu'i bdud rtsi bkug nas thim par gyur pa la
T02D1291:150b-37: / aom a'a: h'um gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1291:150b-38: lha rnams kyi lce la rdo rje nas kyi 'bras bu tsam bsams la bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o //
T02D1291:150b-39: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa mri ta sva da na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko nyham /
T02D1291:150b-40: de nas lha mo brgyad 'phros pa las byang chub
T02D1291:150b-41: kyi sems la sogs pa gong du brjod pa lta
T02D1291:150b-42: bur bsdus te gtso bo nas brtsams te dkyil 'khor
T02D1291:151a-0: mchod par bya'o // aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza @151a * //
T02D1291:151a-1: badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1291:151a-2: de nas lha mo de dag gis bstod pa /
T02D1291:151a-3: khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rnams yongs su bskor //
T02D1291:151a-4: nyid kyi thugs kyis khyod kyi dgongs pa 'grub //
T02D1291:151a-5: g-yo dang mi g-yo 'khor ba kun sgrub khyod //
T02D1291:151a-6: snying rje'i thugs kyis sems can byang chub bsgrub //
T02D1291:151a-7: sgyu ma spros pa'i thugs ni sgrub mdzad pa //
T02D1291:151a-8: rdo rje he ru ka dpal dgyes pa'i thugs //
T02D1291:151a-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta stu ti badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1291:151a-10: de ltar bsgoms pa las dang po sprin lta bu dang /
T02D1291:151a-11: gnyis pa du ba lta bu dang /
T02D1291:151a-12: gsum pa glog gi rnam pa lta bu dang /
T02D1291:151a-13: bzhi pa mar me lta bu dang /
T02D1291:151a-14: lnga pa thams cad gsal ba'i sprin med pa'i nam mkha' lta bu ste /
T02D1291:151a-16: rmi lam dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1291:151a-17: de nas 'khor lo bzhi la gnas par bya ste /
T02D1291:151a-18: lte bar gtum mo sbar ba yis //
T02D1291:151a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te //
T02D1291:151a-20: spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs nas //
T02D1291:151a-21: bsregs pas ham las ri bong 'dzag / de ni bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o //
T02D1291:151a-22: de nas dag pa rjes su dran par bya ste /
T02D1291:151a-23: spyan dmar pa ni snying rje'o //
T02D1291:151a-24: yan lag gnag pa ni byams pa'o //
T02D1291:151a-25: zhabs bzhi ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'o //
T02D1291:151a-26: zhal brgyad ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do //
T02D1291:151a-27: phyag bcu drug ni stong pa nyid bcu drug go //
T02D1291:151a-28: 'khor lo dang rna cha dang mgur chu dang gdu bu dang /
T02D1291:151a-29: ska rags ni mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mtha'
T02D1291:151a-30: yas dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang rnam par snang
T02D1291:151a-31: mdzad dang don yod grub pa rnams go rims bzhin
T02D1291:151a-32: no // khro bo ni gdug pa 'dul ba'o //
T02D1291:151a-33: spyan gsum ni sku gsum mo //
T02D1291:151a-34: rus pa ni bden pa bzhi'o //
T02D1291:151a-35: gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
T02D1291:151a-36: dang rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje
T02D1291:151a-37: ma dang / gsang ba'i goo r'i dang chu ma
T02D1291:151a-38: dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang bdag med ma'o
T02D1291:151a-39: ma dang / // sa dang chu dang me dang
T02D1291:151a-40: rlung ni pukka s'i dang ri khrod ma dang gtum
T02D1291:151a-42: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya
T02D1291:151a-43: dang chos ni goo r'i dang chom rkun ma dang
T02D1291:151a-44: za phod ma dang sa spyod ma dang mkha' spyod
T02D1291:151a-45: ma'o // phyag g-yon gyi thod pa brgyad na sa
T02D1291:151a-46: la sogs pa brgyad 'dzin pa ni yo byad phun
T02D1291:151a-48: phyag g-yas kyi thod pa na glang po la sogs
T02D1291:151a-49: pa 'dzin pa ni glo nad dang dbugs mi bde
T02D1291:151a-50: ba dang smyo ba dang khrag skyug pa dang /
T02D1291:151b-1: mcher ba'i nad dang mchin pa'i nad rnams zhi bar byed pa'o //
T02D1291:151b-2: bsam gtan gyis dub na sngags kyi bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D1291:151b-4: pim ga lordhva ke sha wa rta ma ne /
T02D1291:151b-5: tsa tu rbim sha ti ne tr'a ya /
T02D1291:151b-6: sho da sha bhu dz'a ya /
T02D1291:151b-7: krishna dz'i m'u ta wa pu she /
T02D1291:151b-8: ka p'a la m'a l'a ne k'a dh'a ri ne /
T02D1291:151b-9: aadha m'a ta kr'u ra tsitt'a ya /
T02D1291:151b-11: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02D1291:151b-12: k'a ra ya k'a ra ya /
T02D1291:151b-15: sho sha ya sho sha ya /
T02D1291:151b-17: bandha bandha n'a g'a shta k'an /
T02D1291:151b-20: ha h'a hi h'i hu h'u he hee ho loo ham ha: phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1291:151b-21: yang na aom de ba pi tsu badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1291:151b-22: zhes rgyun du bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1291:151b-23: de nas gtor ma gong ma ltar bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1291:151b-24: mdun gyi nam mkha' la chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang du /
T02D1291:151b-25: padma 'dab ma brgyad sum brtsegs su dkar po dang
T02D1291:151b-26: nag po dang dmar po la aom dang h'um dang
T02D1291:151b-27: a'a: rnams las lha brgyad dang /
T02D1291:151b-28: phyogs skyong brgyad dang klu brgyad bkod la de la
T02D1291:151b-29: ye shes kyi lha bstim pa dang sku gsung thugs
T02D1291:151b-31: lce la rdo rje bsams te sngags 'dis btang ngo //
T02D1291:151b-61: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarbba dha rm'a n'am /
T02D1291:151b-62: a'a d+ya nutpanna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1291:151b-63: bsgom pa'i mthar smon lam ni /
T02D1291:151b-64: rigs bzang skye dang smyo min pa //
T02D1291:151b-65: dam tshig ldan zhing kye'i rdor 'chang //
T02D1291:151b-66: bla ma bsnyen bkur snying rje ldan //
T02D1291:151b-67: bdag ni skye zhing skye gyur cig / lag pas rdo rje dril bu 'khrol //
T02D1291:151b-69: btsun mo'i khu ba yang dag za //
T02D1291:151b-70: bdag ni skye zhing skye gyur cig / bdag ni shes rab ldan pa ma yin yang //
T02D1291:151b-71: 'du byed rgya mtshos g-yengs dang blo chung yang //
T02D1291:151b-72: phan par bsams nas sgrub thabs 'di brtsams pas //
T02D1291:151b-73: 'gro kun kye yi rdo rje myur thob shog / bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
